title: There's a big Fed inflation reading coming Friday. Here's what to expect
content: There could be some pretty good inflation news on the way from the Commerce Department when it releases a key economic report Friday.
summary: There could be some pretty good inflation news on the way from the Commerce Department when it releases a key economic report Friday.

title: Nike shares plunge after retailer says quarterly sales will fall 10%, warns on China weakness
content: Nike has found itself in a rough patch as the sneaker giant has worked to claw back market share it's ceded to upstarts like On Running and Hoka.
summary: Nike has found itself in a rough patch as the sneaker giant has worked to claw back market share it's ceded to upstarts like On Running and Hoka.

title: Rivian investor day focuses on cost reductions, efficiencies and next-generation EVs
content: Rivian shares fell about 2% to 6% for much of the event on Thursday, eating into their 23% gain the day before on news of an up to $5 billion investment by VW.
summary: Rivian shares fell about 2% to 6% for much of the event on Thursday, eating into their 23% gain the day before on news of an up to $5 billion investment by VW.

title: Chinese automakers expected to achieve 33% global market share by 2030
content: Chinese automakers are expected to continue rapidly expanding outside of China to achieve 33% of the global automotive market share by 2030.
summary: Chinese automakers are expected to continue rapidly expanding outside of China to achieve 33% of the global automotive market share by 2030.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: The humble onion could be holding India's economy hostage
content: Even a modest change in the price of the bulbous vegetable soon becomes the talking point around dinner tables for hundreds of millions of people in the country.
summary: Even a modest change in the price of the bulbous vegetable soon becomes the talking point around dinner tables for hundreds of millions of people in the country.

title: In a new round of 'panda diplomacy,' China sends giant bears to the U.S. after two decades
content: After 21 years, giant pandas are en route from China to the U.S. — a sign that Beijing is resuming its "panda diplomacy" efforts as relations with the West thaw.
summary: After 21 years, giant pandas are en route from China to the U.S. — a sign that Beijing is resuming its "panda diplomacy" efforts as relations with the West thaw.

title: JPMorgan Chase says its stress test losses should be higher than what the Fed disclosed
content: Last year, Bank of America and Citigroup made similar disclosures, saying that estimates of their own future income differed from the Fed's results.
summary: Last year, Bank of America and Citigroup made similar disclosures, saying that estimates of their own future income differed from the Fed's results.

title: Forget to-do lists. Here are 4 tips on how to stop procrastinating
content: In a world that is increasingly distractible, learning how to harness our attention is the "skill of the century," says best-selling author Nir Eyal.
summary: In a world that is increasingly distractible, learning how to harness our attention is the "skill of the century," says best-selling author Nir Eyal.

title: Onboard forests, street markets and reefs: Disney releases details about its new cruise in Singapore
content: The Disney Adventure will sail three- and four-night voyages from Singapore starting in 2025, with the capacity to carry some 6,700 passengers on board.
summary: The Disney Adventure will sail three- and four-night voyages from Singapore starting in 2025, with the capacity to carry some 6,700 passengers on board.

title: Chewy stock pops 34% after Roaring Kitty posts a dog picture, then gives it all back

title: Home prices begin to cool as active listings jump 35%
content: For the four weeks ended June 23, the typical home sold for slightly less than its asking price, according to real estate brokerage Redfin.

title: Trump will debate Biden while still bound by gag orders. Here's what he can't say

title: U.S. needs major nuclear power expansion to meet rising electricity demand, Southern Company CEO says
content: The U.S. needs to install more than 10 gigawatts of new nuclear power, said Chris Womack.

title: Sweden's central bank chief says 2 to 3 more rate cuts this year is a 'forecast not a promise'

title: ‘A disastrous event’: All-out war between Israel and Hezbollah could devastate both sides
content: Hezbollah, considered to be among the most heavily armed nonstate groups in the world, is estimated to have 10 times the military capability of Hamas.

title: H&M plunges 13% on doubts over full-year margin target, June sales outlook
content: Shares of H&M plunged more than 14% Thursday morning after the company reported a smaller-than-expected increase in second quarter profits.
summary: Shares of H&M plunged more than 14% Thursday morning after the company reported a smaller-than-expected increase in second quarter profits.

title: Walgreens stock plunges as drugstore chain slashes profit guidance in 'challenging' consumer environment
content: The results and guidance cut come as Walgreens works to slash costs by closing underperforming U.S. stores, among other measures.

title: China sets mid-July for highly anticipated ‘Third Plenum’ meeting to discuss 'deepening reform'

title: Japanese yen hits weakest level against dollar since 1986, reigniting intervention speculation

title: China's EV architect says investing in Europe is a way forward
